workflow.meta: 反馈意见回复流程（挂牌适用）（含告知函回复、问询函回复、专项核查等）

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg: '底稿系统中完成“监管机构审核反馈阶段”底稿上传工作，才能发起流程。'

<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var bean = ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.papers.LinkstecBean");
var result  = bean.execute("1006",$Login.User.UserID,"2",O_WORKFLOW.XMMC,"lcIB_FKYJHFLCB",O_WORKFLOW.JGFKCX,"");
var code =result.get('result');
code ==1;

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
var  cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and SFWCXC = 3",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
cnt1 >0 && cnt2 > 0

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
var  cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and SFWCXC = 3",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
cnt1 > 0 && cnt2 ==0

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var status=ABS_SQLVALUE("select max(status) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where upper(lcbd)=upper('lcIB_FKYJHFLCB') and lcbdid=?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
status==1

step.name: 投资银行总部职能经理审批
投资银行总部总经理审批

function.name: lb.WfFormUpdate
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var shls=O_WORKFLOW.LC;
if (shls == null || shls == 0){
shls = 1;
}else{
shls = shls+1;
}
shls;

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var fhbz = ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'");
var fhz=true;
if(fhbz==0){
  fhz=true;
}else{
  var bean = ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.apexsoft.livebosbean.TaskEndBean");
  var result = bean.perform($Login.User.UserID,O_WORKFLOW.InstID);
  var code = result.get('O_CODE');
  var note = result.get('O_NOTE');
  if(code > 0){
      ABS_SETRETNOTE(note);
     fhz= true;
   }else{
      ABS_SETRETNOTE(note);
      fhz= false;
   }
}
fhz;

dynOwner.describe: 新三板_质控二部总经理

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var fhbz = ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'");
var fhz=true;
if(fhbz==0){
  fhz=true;
}else{
  var bean = ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.apexsoft.livebosbean.TaskEndBean");
  var result = bean.perform($Login.User.UserID,O_WORKFLOW.InstID);
  var code = result.get('O_CODE');
  var note = result.get('O_NOTE');
  if(code > 0){
      ABS_SETRETNOTE(note);
     fhz= true;
   }else{
      ABS_SETRETNOTE(note);
      fhz= false;
   }
}

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a=ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.gdzqWorkflowWebservice.workflowSamples.InternalDocumentsJavabean");
var oaid=a.creatNewWorkFlow("lcIB_FKYJHFLCB",O_WORKFLOW.ID,O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.ID,$Login.User,'110000');
var ret = LB_sqlProcedure("{call ecif.pro_ib_oaresulthandle(:ral{int},:ret,?,?,?,?)}",[oaid,O_WORKFLOW.ID,"lcIB_FKYJHFLCB",$Login.User]); 
ABS_SETRETNOTE(ret.get('ret'));
if(ret.get('ral')>0){
	true;
}else{
	false;
}

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 88 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_FKYJHFLCB",O_WORKFLOW.ID,89,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}
